channel.title: ArcticScape
channel.description:
[center][b][u][size=16pt]Features[/size][/u][/b]
[size=11pt]Zombie Onslaught Minigame Working Dominion Tower with Rewards Dicing Dungeoneering System Drygore Weaponry Kalphite Armour Off Hand Weapons Custom Weapons Boss Contracts All Skills Work Custom Title System Difficulty System (Harder Difficulty = Better drops) Prestige System (6 in Total) Prestige Skulls Prestige Shops Skilling Reward Points + Shop PvP LeaderBoards + PKP Shop New SOF System (Includes Items) Donator Shop Voting Shop Custom Bosses Custom Weapons Fully Coded Queen Black Dragon Fully Coded King Black Dragon Fully Coded Corporeal Beast Fully Coded Nex Tormented Demons Glacors Achievement System Working Curses 753 Item/Interfaces Skilling Point System Auto Double XP Weekends All Emotes Working Auras Working Specials Incredibly Stable No Dupes Professional Staff Webclient And much, much more![/size]
Website: [url=http://ArcticScape.4umer.com]ArcticScape.4umer.com[/url][/center] [center][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/IkicqXu.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/LwEDHDS.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/kwlAXlO.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/AMqWjk6.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/sCAyU2n.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/WWc40bG.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/qNu0LTq.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/IXAkvSv.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/lDJpf2f.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/H1kbyws.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/NvOwOgq.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/sum1GIT.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/DBcGGkD.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/uG3sw6D.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/JWa5fUi.jpg[/img][/center]
[size=10pt]Thank you King Fox for releasing such a great source. Credits go to him and his Rune Evo V3 Source. I will simply be editing the source and using his source as a foundation.[/size]

item.title: ArcticScape
item.dc:creator: @Rickymac6 Rickymac6
item.description:
@Rickymac6 wrote:

Updated the source!

[center]Added Features
Zombie Onslaught Minigame
Dungeoneering System
Drygore Weaponry
Kalphite Armour
Off Hand Weapons
Boss Contracts
All Skills Work
Custom Title System
Difficulty System (Harder Difficulty = Better drops)
Prestige System (6 in Total)
Prestige Shops
Skilling Reward Points + Shop
PvP LeaderBoards + PKP Shop
New SOF System (Includes Items)
And all the features of V1![/center]

Read full topic
